ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
PrecisOrder prescribing an additional period during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to The Hon. MAURICE J. HERAUF, who was required to relocate to the City of Swift Current following his appointment as a Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench for Saskatchewan on June 1st, 2007.
AttachmentsAttachment
